info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 6:13AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Rapides and northwestern Evangeline Parishes through 700 AM CDT... At 613 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Glenmora, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glenmora, Cheneyville, Turkey Creek, Lecompte, Forest Hill and Mcnary. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 55 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
